sourcesContent:
// lessons-learned-tool-main/client/src/components/ViewIssueModal.js import React from 'react'; export default function ViewIssueModal({ issue, onClose }) { const { ntId, email, projectName, ratedPower, ratedSpeed, application, legislation, fieSystem, egtSystem, issueTitle, description, issueType, customerName, fuelType, files, solution } = issue; return (

Issue Details

Reported by: {ntId}
Email: {email}
Project: {projectName}
Customer: {customerName}
Rated Power: {ratedPower} kW
Rated Speed: {ratedSpeed} rpm
Application: {application}
Legislation: {legislation}
FIE System: {fieSystem || '-'}
EGT System: {egtSystem || '-'}
Fuel Type: {fuelType}
Issue Type: {issueType}
Issue Title:
{issueTitle}
Description:

{description}

{files?.length > 0 && (
Issue Attachments:
    {files.map((file, i) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)} {solution && ( <>

Solution

Solved by: {solution.solvedBy?.ntId || '-'}
{/* Added nullish coalescing for safety */}
Email: {solution.solvedBy?.email || '-'}
{/* Added nullish coalescing for safety */}
Solution Type: {solution.type || '-'}
{/* CHANGED FROM solution.category to solution.type */}
Description:

{solution.description}

{solution.files?.length > 0 && (
Solution Attachments:
    {solution.files.map((file, i) => (
  • {file.originalname}
    • ))}
)}
)}
); }
